2 Задание
+=====================+
000000000000ff82            ff821111111110000010            ff82
000000000000000000000000ffffff82                        ffffff8211111111111111111111111110000010                        ffffff82

3 Задание
+=====================+
Signed multiplication by 2:
A:
000000000000ffd5            ffd51111111111010101            ffd5
A*2:
000000000000ffaa            ffaa1111111110101010            ffaa
==============================

Unsigned multiplication by 2:
B:
000000000000001b              1b0000000000011011              1b
B*2
0000000000000000               00000000000000000               0
==============================

Signed division by 2:
C:
000000000000ffe6            ffe61111111111100110            ffe6
C/2:
000000000000fff3            fff31111111111110011            fff3
==============================

Unsigned division by 2:
D:
000000000000003e              3e0000000000111110              3e
D/2:
000000000000001f              1f0000000000011111              1f
==============================

E mod 16:
E:
000000000000002b              2b0000000000101011              2b
E mod:
000000000000000b               b0000000000001011               b
==============================

Round F to 16x
F:
0000000000000034              340000000000110100              34
F to 16x:
0000000000000030              300000000000110000              30

4 Задание
+=====================+
Task 4 for M
SIGNED MOVE LEFT:
Before
0000001111011010
After
0000011110110100

UNSIGNED MOVE LEFT:
Before
0000001111011010
After
0000011110110100

SIGNED MOVE RIGHT:
Before
0000001111011010
After
0000011110110100

UNSIGNED MOVE RIGHT:
Before
0000001111011010
After0000011110110100

&15
Before0000001111011010
After0000000000001111=15
0000000000001010

&16
Before0000001111011010
After1111111111110000=-16
0000001111010000

Task 4 for N
SIGNED MOVE LEFT:
Before
1111111110000010
After
1111111100000100

SIGNED MOVE RIGHT:
Before
1111111110000010
After
1111111100000100

&15
Before1111111110000010
After0000000000001111=15
0000000000000010

&16
Before1111111110000010
After1111111111110000=-16
1111111110000000

+=====================+
Down: 976 Up: 992
